original_title: Super Furry Animals - Rings Around The World
overview: The fifth album from Welsh pop prodigies Super Furry Animals, Rings Around the World, is their most staggeringly ambitious work to date. Featuring everything from Status Quo-style boogie-rockers to technofied drill & bass meltdowns. Added to this they make rock & roll history by releasing an album and DVD simultaneously. The DVD holds twelve specially commissioned film shorts rendered in dizzying surround sound. This is an immaculately conceived pop masterpiece.
title: Super Furry Animals - Rings Around The World
